resources.string: Please ensure that your internet connection is active and then try again in few minutes. Thank You!
An error has occurred. Please try again in few minutes. Thank You!
An active Internet connection is required to access the server. Please enable Mobile data or try again in few minutes.

This application is a part of the UItilities collection, which focuses on proffering solutions to various inherent problems in and around the University of Ibadan campus. Campus Reports as the name suggests, aids in the submission and resolution of all complaints/reports regards various services on campus such as Transportation (Cabs and Bikes), and Consumables provider (Hall Cafeterias and Butteries).
